docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
The system is built on CodeIgniter/Laravel stack with modular design.

  • Multi-tenant support
  • RESTful API
  • DB: MySQL/Postgres

docs.title: Milestones
docs.text:
• MVP v0.1 – CRM + Accounting + Warehouse
  • v1.0 – RS.ge Integration + Banking API
  • v2.0 – HR + Project Management + Marketplace ccc dsdssdsd dsfdssd dsdsdssdds as as sdsdsdsd
